reasoning: Most common inherited cause of intellectual disability. Incidence ~2-3 per 100k births (1 in 4000 males, 1 in 8000 females). Using 2.5 per 100k as average estimate from population screening studies.
source: Hunter J et al. (2014). Epidemiology of fragile X syndrome: a systematic review and meta-analysis. Am J Med Genet A. 164A(7):1648-1658
